cookingTips: Soak wooden skewers in water for at least 30 minutes before using to prevent burning
Wrap bacon around quail and alternate with mushrooms on skewers for balanced cooking
Grill over medium-high heat for 8-10 minutes, turning frequently until bacon is crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These are elegant skewered appetizers. How do you ensure the quail cooks through while the bacon crisps properly?
